name: Trail Blazers
description:
Update: The game now has a WebGL build which you can run directly in your browser! Best played in fullscreen.

A fun 2-4-Player Local Multiplayer game created during Nordic Game Jam.

Action, mazing and trapping at the highest level in this cartoony mood bomb.

Paint as much of the ground as you can with your leaking Power Juice. When ignited by bombs, your Power Juice spots grants you points. When ignited, the burning Power Juice can kill friends as well as foes, so watch out!

Recommended for casual couch playing with friends. Linux installer for SteamOS is possible if requested.

Controls

Players 1: WASD

Player 2: Arrow Keys

Player 3: YGHJ

Player 4: Numpad 4568

Creators

Created by Simon Weber (Graphics) and Mads Overgård Henningsen (Programming) during the 2016 Nordic Game Jam.

Video

The game was featured on one of Jupiter_Hadley's Youtube videos. You can check it out the video and her channel here.
